snippet: How the Supreme Court rules on a case about racial preferences in admissions could affect the prospects of future applicants to colleges and universities, as well as the practices of admissions offices charged with deciding whom to offer enrollment.
abstract: How the Supreme Court rules on a case about racial preferences in admissions could affect the prospects of future applicants to colleges and universities, as well as the practices of admissions offices charged with deciding whom to offer enrollment.

byline.original: By JACQUES STEINBERG and TANYA ABRAMS

headline.main: This Week's Admissions Tip: Pay Close Attention to the Supreme Court
